sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: No way! I refuse to accept that!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I don't understand. Accept it or not, I am Ken Takakura.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Stop it! I don't wanna hear it!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Crap! The curse! Miss Ayase! Hurry! Your psychic powers!

sp.speaker: Turbo Granny
sp.p: Lemme gobble that weenie!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Th-Thank you very much.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Let's set a few rules. No speaking your name.

sp.speaker: ken
sp.p: Okay

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Because you like the occult, you're Okarun

sp.speaker: Okarun
sp.p: O-Okarun?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: If you use that name, I'll kill you.

sp.speaker: Okarun
sp.p: "That name"? It's my own name. Well, I guess I have mo choice, so that's fine.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: You don't seem that upset about it, Okarun!

sp.speaker: Okarun
sp.p: What? This is against my will!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Hey, lemme see your face! You're looking happy, Okarun!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: You farted in front of my face! You're the worst

sp.speaker: Okarun
sp.p: It's because you're putting pressure on me, Miss Ayase!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Hold on a sec! It's already morning! That means Turbo Granny won't come out anymore?

sp.speaker: Okarun
sp.p: Huh? Is that true.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I mean, ghosts show up at night, right? Why don't you come to my place for now? That outfit... is scarier than a ghost.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: My Grandma's really hard on guys so be careful. She almost killed a previous boyfriend,

sp.speaker: Okarun
sp.p: Huh? You wait till now to say that?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: What's going on Okarun! Are you okay?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Must be this. Sorry, Okarun! A barrier's been put up!

sp.speaker: Okarun
sp.p: I thought I was gonna die.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Okay, now try coming in!

sp.speaker: Okarun
sp.p: Is it really gonna be okay?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: If you burn, I'll toss you into the river again, so it's okay.

sp.speaker: Okarun
sp.p: Whoa, Freaky.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: You're safe! How do you feel? Any changes?

sp.speaker: Okarun
sp.p: My entire body tingles.
